attributes.action: Stop companies using the withhold number telephone system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal is for companies that use the telephone for selling, promotions and conducting surveys: that they must by law not use the withhold number facility so that the recipient can if the calls persist and when there appears to be no one there be able to contact the appropriate authotity, with the callers number, for action to be taken to prevent such activity in the future.
